allow: Bash(SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN=sbp_746ebb84f490d20073c38c4d1fdb503b2267a2ac curl -s "https://api.supabase.com/v1/projects/pgroxddbtaevdegnidaz/database/query" -H "Authorization: Bearer sbp_746ebb84f490d20073c38c4d1fdb503b2267a2ac" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""query"": ""SELECT tablename FROM pg_tables WHERE schemaname = ''''public'''' AND tablename IN (''''warehouses'''', ''''locations'''', ''''machines'''', ''''production_lines'''', ''''allergens'''', ''''tax_codes'''', ''''user_invitations'''') ORDER BY tablename;""}")

Bash(SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN=sbp_746ebb84f490d20073c38c4d1fdb503b2267a2ac curl -s "https://api.supabase.com/v1/projects/pgroxddbtaevdegnidaz/database/query" -H "Authorization: Bearer sbp_746ebb84f490d20073c38c4d1fdb503b2267a2ac" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""query"": ""SELECT trigger_name, event_manipulation, event_object_table, action_statement FROM information_schema.triggers WHERE trigger_name = ''''trigger_auto_activate_user'''';""}")
